ygData.subject: Re: War
ygData.msgSnippet: ... the ... and ... land ... OOC: Oh, man, I really want this battle to end, it s boring, I ll never attack another base again! BIC: Stronghold is hit twice

> Zardus fires a few shots at Stronghold, turning his head as his wrist
> computer beeps, reporting someone trying to access classified information.
> Easilly dodging Jetsotrorm's shots and tapping a few buttons, he orders
the
> Alliance base's computer to disallow any access to any classified info,
and
> to keep a close log.
>
> Turning back to the battle, he fires again at Stronghold, gliding in to
land
> on the ground.

OOC: Oh, man, I really want this battle to end, it's boring, I'll never
attack another base again!

BIC: Stronghold is hit twice and growls.

"That's it! I quit! We're not getting paid enough for this!" Stronghold
grabs Blender and starts leaving.

"Where do you think your going?" Deemos asks.

"Somewhere good, like Cybertron!" Stronghold says.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Bloodystrike fires at one of the missiles heading for him, making it
explode.
> The explosion covers him with flame, the Alliance bot gritting his teeth
in
> pain.
>
> He looks arond as the flames clear, seeing Sharpedge carry Jetstorm to a
CR.
> He flies forward, flying up to the Mafia base and looking through a hole,
> Reptilica flying up near him.
>
> "Shall we blow the CR chambers?" Bloodystrike asks, the other nodding and
> suddenly flying back as an autogun shot hits him. He flies forward again,
the
> two dodging autogun fire as they attempt to enter the base.

OOC: New shields are up, but if you want to blow the base up, go right
ahead, I just need time to bail out my bots. I want this battle OVER!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Diving again for another attack, Havoc drops two bombs at Stronghold and
> Blender, firing at Rizopas with his machine guns.

Blender cries out in pain and laughs.

"You and me, Stronghold, we leave, let them fight." Blender mutters.

"I'm dragging you, aren't I?" Stronghold says.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
